designTokens.spacing: Tailwind default spacing scale (e.g., p-4, p-6, gap-3, h-16)

gridSystem.layout: Sidebar (w-64 on lg) + Main Flexible Content area
gridSystem.maxConstraints: max-w-5xl for main dashboard, max-w-[1200px] for search overlay
gridSystem.columns: Responsive grid usage: grid-cols-1 to md:grid-cols-3 for tools, grid-cols-1 to sm:grid-cols-2 for danger zone, lg:grid-cols-3 for smoke points.

componentBreakdown.name: Sticky Header
componentBreakdown.purpose: Top navigation containing branding and search entry point.

componentBreakdown.name: Sidebar Navigation
componentBreakdown.purpose: Left-side menu containing anchor links to modules, tools, and displaying system status.

componentBreakdown.name: Search Overlay / Command Line Interface
componentBreakdown.purpose: Full-screen modal to quickly jump to food temperatures via text input, maintaining a tech/brutalist aesthetic.

componentBreakdown.name: Data Table (Meat & Poultry)
componentBreakdown.purpose: Displays temperature thresholds for various meats organized by doneness.

componentBreakdown.name: Unit Converter
componentBreakdown.purpose: Rapidly converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin using three bound input fields.

componentBreakdown.name: Visual Temperature Bar (Danger Zone)
componentBreakdown.purpose: Thermometer-style visual representation of safe and unsafe temperature zones.

componentBreakdown.name: Danger Context Card
componentBreakdown.purpose: Displays holding temperatures and bacterial reasoning facts.

componentBreakdown.name: List Card (Smoke Points)
componentBreakdown.purpose: Categorized list of oils and their respective smoke points.

componentBreakdown.name: Affiliate Hardware Card
componentBreakdown.purpose: Promotes recommended thermometer hardware with purchase links and prices.

componentBreakdown.name: Mobile Nav Toggle
componentBreakdown.purpose: Floating action button providing access to navigation on mobile screens.

componentBreakdown.name: Footer Key Legend
componentBreakdown.purpose: Describes keyboard shortcuts available in the Search Overlay.

reusablePatterns.name: Brutalist Cards
reusablePatterns.traits: Thick borders (border, border-2), hard shadows (shadow-hard), highly contrasted headers (uppercase, Space Grotesk font).

reusablePatterns.name: Interactive Data Tables
reusablePatterns.traits: Full width, hover states (hover:bg-gray-100 or line highlights), distinct headers with heavy background.

reusablePatterns.name: Badges & Pills
reusablePatterns.traits: Square corners, solid background blocks with mono font (e.g., REF-001, Biohazard), status pulsing dots.

reusablePatterns.name: Form Inputs
reusablePatterns.traits: Thick borders (border-2 border-ink), square corners, focus rings removed or replaced by shadow/border color changes.

reusablePatterns.name: Result List Items
reusablePatterns.traits: Flex row containers with baseline alignment, categorical tags (e.g. [POULTRY]), dotted leader lines on desktop, and trailing data/actions.
